org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat.discord

Class DiscordEmbed.Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat.discord.DiscordEmbed.Field
  • Enclosing class:
    DiscordEmbed

    public static class DiscordEmbed.Field
extends java.lang.Object
    A text field inside an embed, they are structured in paragraphs and each can have a title and a description.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Field(boolean inline)
      Creates a new blank field.
      Field(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a new field object with a title and a description, that is not displayed in line.
      See: #Field(String, String, boolean)
      Field(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, boolean inline)
      Creates a new field object with a title and a description that ca either be displayed in line with other fields or has it's on paragraph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getName()
      Returns the fields title, also referred to as field name
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getValue()
      Returns the fields description, also referred to as field value
      boolean isInline()
      States if the field is displayed in one line with other fields or if every field is in a new line

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Field

        public Field(boolean inline)
        Creates a new blank field.

        Example for inline=true
        Example for inline=false

        Parameters:
        inline - true if the field should be displayed in line with other fields, false if not

        public Field(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String value)

        Parameters:
        name - the title of the field
        value - the description of the field

      • Field

        public Field(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String value,
             boolean inline)
        Creates a new field object with a title and a description that ca either be displayed in line with other fields or has it's on paragraph

        value - the description of the field

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getName()
        Returns the fields title, also referred to as field name
        Returns:
        optional container with the name of the field or an empty optional if blank

      • getValue

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getValue()
        Returns the fields description, also referred to as field value
        Returns:
        optional container with the value of the field or an empty optional if blank

      • isInline

        public boolean isInline()
        States if the field is displayed in one line with other fields or if every field is in a new line
        Returns:
        true if in line with other fields, false if not
